data.text: Monna Awurade ase na ɔyɛ;
Momma wɔn a Awurade agye wɔn nka saa,
wɔn a ɔboaboaa wɔn ano firii nsase soɔ no,
Ebinom kyinkyinii wɔ nsase paradada so,
Ɛkɔm ne sukɔm dee wɔn
Afei wɔsu frɛɛ Awurade wɔ wɔn amanehunu mu,
Ɔde wɔn faa ɛkwan tee so
Momma wɔnna Awurade ase, nʼadɔeɛ a ɛnsa da ho
Ɔma wɔn a sukɔm de wɔn nsuo
Ebinom tenaa esum ne awerɛhoɔ mu,
ɛfiri sɛ, wɔtee Onyankopɔn nsɛm ho atua
Enti ɔgyaa wɔn maa adwuma den;
Afei, wɔsu frɛɛ Awurade wɔ wɔn amanehunu mu,
Ɔyii wɔn firii esum ne awerɛhoɔ mu
Momma wɔnna Awurade ase, nʼadɔeɛ a ɛnsa da ho
Ɔbubu kɔbere mfrafraeɛ apono
Ebinom bɛyɛɛ nkwaseafoɔ, wɔn atuateɛ enti
Wɔkyirii aduane nyinaa
Afei, wɔsu frɛɛ Awurade, wɔn amanehunu mu
Ɔsomaa nʼasɛm na ɔsaa wɔn yadeɛ;
Momma wɔnna Awurade ase, nʼadɔeɛ a ɛnsa da ho
Momma wɔmmɔ aseda afɔdeɛ
Ebinom tenaa ahyɛn mu wɔ ɛpo so;
Wɔhunuu Awurade nnwuma,
Ɔkasaeɛ maa ahum tui
Wɔpagya kɔɔ sorosoro na wɔsiane kɔɔ ebunu mu tɔnn;
Wɔkyim totɔɔ ntintan sɛ asabofoɔ;
Afei, wɔsu frɛɛ Awurade, wɔn amanehunu mu,
Ɔmaa ahum no yɛɛ dinn;
Wɔn ani gyeeɛ ɛberɛ a ɛyɛɛ dinn no,
Momma wɔnna Awurade ase, nʼadɔeɛ a ɛnsa da ho
Wɔmma ne so wɔ asafo no mu
Ɔdanee nsubɔntene maa no yɛɛ ɛserɛ,
na asasebereɛ danee nkyenenkyene,
Ɔdanee ɛserɛ so maa no yɛɛ nsuwansuwa
Ɛhɔ na ɔde wɔn a ɛkɔm de wɔn kɔsoɛe,
Wɔyɛɛ mfuo ne bobe nturo
Ɔhyiraa wɔn na wɔn ase dɔreeɛ.
Afei wɔn dodoɔ so hwaneeɛ
deɛ ɔbu aberempɔn animtiaa no
Nanso, ɔpagyaa ahiafoɔ firii wɔn ahohia mu
Ateneneefoɔ bɛhunu ama wɔn ani gye,
Momma deɛ ɔyɛ onyansafoɔ no mmu yeinom,
